title: Can anyone help me locate these 2 cards..
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: Can anyone help me locate these 2 cards..
posts.post_content:
I have been searchling for these 2 with no luck to complete my seymour back set... I figure the blank back and drum would be tough to find.. but Ive been stuck for several months now. With no where left to turn I figured I could ask the board..

take a look below and let me know if you could point me in the right direction..

thanks
